name: monocotyledonous
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having one cotyledon (= a leaf part inside the seed): plants belonging to the perennial monocotyledonous family of herbs Compare
dicotyledonous
More examplesFewer examplesCocos are a monocotyledonous species of tree.It is a monocotyledonous plant belonging to the family Orchidaceae.She investigated the anatomical structure of very young monocotyledonous seedlings.
